sect2.title: Installation of Flex
sect2.para: There are packages which expect to find the flex library in the /usr/lib directory. Create a symlink to account for this:

Some programs don't know about flex and try to find the lex program (flex is a (better) alternative for lex). To please those programs, create a shell script named lex which calls flex in emulation mode:

para.screen:
cat > /usr/bin/lex << "EOF" #!/bin/sh # Begin /usr/bin/lex
exec /usr/bin/flex -l "$@"
# End /usr/bin/lex EOF chmod 755 /usr/bin/lex
